name: SpeedCube (GamingGamer)
description:
SpeedCube is a endless-runner platform game where your goal is to not fall into the abyss. Simple enough, right?

I made this game in 3 days as a fun challenge for myself, as I've never made a platformer in pygame before

//Web version is slightly laggy, download for smoother experience

//If input stops working, go into fullscreen, click the screen and then go out of fullscreen

Code and assets are here
